# Feature Backlog

Format per item: ID, Title, Description, User Story, Acceptance Criteria, Priority, Effort, Dependencies, Tech Notes, Open Questions.
Effort Scale: S (<1d), M (1–2d), L (3–5d), XL (epic / multi-sprint).
Priorities: P1 (Must), P2 (Should), P3 (Could).

---
ID: F-000
Status: Completed
Title: Sample Feature
Description: Describe the feature here; provide a high-level overview, with clear concise language.
User Story: As a user I want to...
Acceptance Criteria:
- List of specific acceptance criteria items
Priority: P1
Effort: L
Dependencies: none
Tech Notes: Any technical considerations or implementation notes.
Open Questions: Any open questions or uncertainties.

---
